summary.para: The data type and size of all tensors must be the same.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_GRAD_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The tensor containing the input data. This tensor's Sizes should be { BatchCount, ChannelCount, Height, Width }.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_GRAD_OPERATOR_DESC.InputGradientTensor
member.summary: The incoming gradient tensor. This is typically obtained from the output of backpropagation of a preceding layer.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_GRAD_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputGradientTensor
member.summary: An output tensor containing the backpropagated gradients.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_GRAD_OPERATOR_DESC.CrossChannel
member.summary: TRUE if the LRN layer sums across channels; FALSE if the LRN layer sums across spatial dimensions.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_GRAD_OPERATOR_DESC.LocalSize
member.summary: The maximum number of elements to sum over per dimension (the local region is clipped so that all elements are within bounds). If CrossChannel is TRUE, then this is the width and height of the local region. If CrossChannel is FALSE, then this is the number of elements in the local region. This value must be at least 1.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_GRAD_OPERATOR_DESC.Alpha
member.summary: The value of the scaling parameter. We recommend a value of 0.0001 as default.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_GRAD_OPERATOR_DESC.Beta
member.summary: The value of the exponent. We recommend a value of 0.75 as default.

member.name: DML_LOCAL_RESPONSE_NORMALIZATION_GRAD_OPERATOR_DESC.Bias
member.summary: The value of bias. We recommend a value of 1 as default.
